title: Drawing, "Mrs. Rutherford B. Hayes", December 21, 1880
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper margin: 5f. 4 (to 6)/Mrs Hayes/Dec 21.80/2d sketch-/adopted this; at left margin: forehead/clean tones running into/ neutral warmth/some color in the lights/eye brown-not too brown)/growing a little lighter/at the outside-/but still defined/=/whites of occhi= =1/ bluish opning(sic)./rich color all round./Iris=neutral citron=/darker out- side =& more/neutral=/=/much deep surroundings=/bocca-much/color-but not/ warm--low cool/rich-; at center right: wedding ring/&/chased ring/with dia-mond/-/(leave out)/the other/of pearls/(on right hand)/Mrs Hayes/says/(overVerso: Mrs Hayes; no rings on the/right hand-; plain gold/chased gold/& diamond; Diamo

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mrs. Rutherford B. Hayes", December 21, 1880.
December 21, 1880. Graphite
Support: off-white wove paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1052.
